articles.description: With the help of discount and exchange offer, iPhone SE 2020 price can reduce to under Rs. 17,000 on Flipkart for the RED model. Here is how to avail the offer.
articles.content: The latest Apple iPhone 13 as well as iPhone SE 2022 models may seem quite expensive to you. Even after providing decent discounts on them, not everyone can buy them. But, wait, you can still fulfill… [+1405 chars]

articles.title: Realme Narzo 50A Prime launching ahead of GT Neo 3 in India! Check specs, features, more - HT Tech
articles.description: Realme Narzo 50A Prime launch is set to happen before that of Realme GT Neo 3 in India. Know what you will get with this budget smartphone.
articles.content: Realme is all set to bring the 150W charging support smartphone, the Realme GT Neo 3 to India on April 29. But right before this, there is another launch from the company that is coming to India for … [+1906 chars]
